wikipedia_page.main: Iain Campbell (born 28 June 1985) is a Scottish professional footballer who plays for Montrose. After beginning his career at Dunfermline Athletic he has since played for Kilmarnock, Ross County, Clyde, Alloa Athletic, Cowdenbeath and Forfar Athletic.

response: *First Team Coaches: Iain Campbell, Seán Dillon
Ian or Iain Campbell may refer to:
*Iain Campbell Smith (active since 1997), Australian diplomat, singer/songwriter and comedian
